dt: {bc}a tribute anciently exacted on the Scottish border by plundering chiefs in exchange for immunity from pillage
{bc}extortion or coercion by threats especially of public exposure or criminal prosecution

shortdef: a tribute anciently exacted on the Scottish border by plundering chiefs in exchange for immunity from pillage
extortion or coercion by threats especially of public exposure or criminal prosecution

dt: {bc}an attempt to control someone with whom one has an emotional connection by tactics that make the person feel guilty or upset

dt.t: He used {it}emotional blackmail{/it} to get what he wanted from her.

shortdef: an attempt to control someone with whom one has an emotional connection by tactics that make the person feel guilty or upset
